att._opid: OEM Device ID. Factory set, Current software version number and release date.
att._ppid: PAYG Device ID. Factory set. Field override options.
att._flid: Fleet ID. Factory set. Field override options.
att._frmV: Firmware Version. Factory set, Current Model, production date, serial number

cmd._gstw: GPRS Sleep Time Window in mins, _gstw > _gctw
cmd._gctw: GPRS Connect Time Window in mins, _gctw < _gstw
cmd._read: Last read request of ANY GATT <data> = [opid|...|]
cmd._boop: Bypass operation after overload under mains (1:On, 0:Off)
cmd._cbte: Current battery type (0: lead-acid, 1: water-filled, 2: Li-Ion, 3: customised)
cmd._bvsp: Battery Low Voltage Shutdown Point Voltage (V)
cmd._ssrf: Switch on the system reset function
cmd._vohb: Voltage value for high battery voltage alarm (V)
cmd._bcbl: Battery capacity value at BMS lock-up (%)
cmd._remc: Restore the battery capacity value during mains charging (%)
cmd._bard: Battery capacity value when battery resumes discharging (%)
cmd._baso: Battery capacity value required for inverter switch-on (%)
cmd._bvmc: Battery voltage when returning to mains charging (V)
cmd._bvds: Battery voltage when returning to the discharged state (V)
cmd._inom: Inverter operating modes (00: CUT, 01: CSO, 02: SNU, 03: OSO)

sts._time: Device internal timer readout at last communication
sts._plat: Device GPS Latitude, Positioning of telecom operator base stations
sts._plon: Device GPS Longitude, Positioning of telecom operator base stations
sts._cpvp: Currently used PV grid connection protocol (0: India, 1: Germen, 2: SouthAmerica)
sts._cubt: Current battery type (0: AGM, 1: FLD, 2: USER)
sts._woft: Whether the overload restart function is turned on (0: off, 1: on)
sts._chpo: Charging priority order (0: CUT, 1: CSO, 2: SNU, 3: OSO)
sts._otbf: Overload to bypass function (0: off, 1: on)
sts._bccf: BMS communication control function (0: off, 1: on)
sts._svmm: SOC value when BMS returns to mains mode (%)
sts._svbb: SOC value when BMS returns to battery mode (%)
sts._pven: PV feeds energy to the load in AC state (0: no, 1: yes)
sts._whmo: Whether the machine is outputting (0: no, 1: yes)
sts._pvpl: PV power too low abnormality (0: no, 1: yes)
sts._invh: Input voltage too high (0: no, 1: yes)
sts._bavh: Battery voltage too high (0: no, 1: yes)
sts._grcs: Grid connection Status (0: off-grid, 1: waiting, 2: being connected)
sts._libs: Lithium battery activation function switch (0: off, 1: on)
sts._liba: Lithium battery activation process (0: stop, 1: in operation)
sts._bmcn: BMS communication is normal (0: No, 1: Yes)
sts._bmla: BMS low battery alarm flag (0: no, 1: yes)
sts._bmlf: BMS low battery fault flag (0: no, 1: yes)
sts._socv: SOC value when parallel mode is switched off (%)

dta._cuom: Current operating mode (0: UTI, 1: SUB, 2: SBU)
dta._tiiv: Temperature at increased inverter voltage (degrees Celsius)
dta._tnmp: Total number of machines in the parallel system
